description:

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Do we want f7a72d13c062 undone? I think we do.

Alex

LGTM

There is no need to undo the other change.
The other change handles a file name of "" correctly; maybe something else will generate such a name later.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8bbeea196139 ***
